scripts.build: node-sass-chokidar src/scss -o src/css && react-scripts build && git --git-dir=build.git/ --work-tree=build/ add -A && git --git-dir=build.git/ --work-tree=build/ commit -am Build && git --git-dir=build.git/ --work-tree=build/ push deploy master && git --git-dir=build.git/ --work-tree=build/ push github master:built
scripts.watch-css: node-sass-chokidar src/scss -o src/css && node-sass-chokidar src/scss -o src/css --watch
